content:
Today I chose PR 16574 for discussion!

feat (group_theory/amenable) : define amenable groups

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Oh I wasn’t aware of this! I’m doing a project on amenable groups right now, so I may try to revive this at some point.
